comment: If there is a function ` C ( y ) ` such that ` C ( y ) = x ` for all ` y e. B ( x ) ` , then the sets ` B ( x ) ` for distinct ` x e. A ` are disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Dec-2016.)
